Tigerhawk "us Vs an army I say we stall hope for the best if we rush in we 
screwed that's what Iron would do besides we wait the second Prowl gets back 
we go and I'm in." Tigerhawk Gaze into the view screen well "I've got picture 
but no voices." Sees Lio and New bot talking.

::elsewhere::

Lio lets his guard down "No way I still have people I have to protect."

Dark Convoy looks at Lio "O your friends that could give a rats ass if you 
came back dead or alive. Laughs or your pred bitch for a girlfriend where is 
she now Hmmmm just as easily as she turned on them for you she will turn on 
you for one of them. Your dishonor us your emotions may you weak."

Lio glares back "As the carrier of the matrix"

Dark Convoy eyes turn green and he cuts Lio off his tone is sarcastic "your 
are the representative of life on this planet and any other. Grow the fuck up 
little brother who are you fighting for father or this planet and way of life 
join us we will tear this world asunder.  They really did a number when they 
wiped your core you were once one of the most vial of all of us."

Lio looks "stops what do you mean?"
